rows.label: qst610202_msg0002
rows.name:
That's one hungry-looking
Nopon! Maybe we should
give it an offering...

rows.label: qst610202_msg0101
rows.name:
What's a Nopon statue doing
in a place like this...?

rows.label: qst610202_msg0102
rows.name:
Maybe we can make a little
offering... You know, for luck.

rows.label: qst610202_msg0202
rows.name:
Must give thanks! Thank
you, Thank-You Statue!

rows.label: qst610202_msg0203
rows.name:
Grampypon always say good to give
tasty treats to Thank-You Statue.

rows.label: qst610202_msg0301
rows.name:
It appears to be a stone
statue. The carvings are
impressively lifelike...

rows.label: qst610202_msg0302
rows.name:
I believe we may as well
leave a token gift.

rows.label: qst610202_msg0401
rows.name:
Why would someone put a Nopon
statue in this kind of dump?

rows.label: qst610202_msg0402
rows.name:
Ugh, it's giving me the willies, but...
I also feel compelled...to give it
things?! Lots...and lots of things...
